item.title: Safe zone help
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

copy all ur safe zones to a diff doc or backit up then delete all ur safezones and just add this

public boolean nonWild() { if ((absX >= 2923 && absX <= 3338 && absY >= 3225 && absY <= 3531) || heightLevel == 1) { return true; } else { return false; } }
see if it works

btw add ur safezones things like this so its easier to edit

|| (absX >= 2839 && absX <= 2850 && absY >= 4826 && absY <= 4841) || (absX >= 2653 && absX <= 2667 && absY >= 4832 && absY <= 4846) || (absX >= 2709 && absX <= 2725 && absY >= 4830 && absY <= 4841) || (absX >= 2577 && absX <= 2597 && absY >= 4832 && absY <= 4846) || (absX >= 2444 && absX <= 2485 && absY >= 4810 && absY <= 4855) || (absX >= 2884 && absX <= 2943 && absY >= 9899 && absY <= 9922) || (absX >= 2752 && absX <= 2764 && absY >= 3493 && absY <= 3503) || (absX >= 2611 && absX <= 2577 && absY >= 3148 && absY <= 3178) || (absX >= 2577 && absX <= 2611 && absY >= 3178 && absY <= 3148) || (absX >= 2645 && absX <= 2656 && absY >= 4773 && absY <= 4788)

heightLevel == 1) { return true; } else { return false; } }

item.title: Safe zone help
item.dc:creator: @Season-Scape Season-Scape
item.description:
@Season-Scape wrote:

when i try make a safe zone it complies ok then when i log on its not worked, i type ::goup to the next height lvl it was safe
here’s my code what am i doing wrong!

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3338 && absX <= 2923 && absY >=3225 && absY <=3531 ) || (absX >= 3009 && absX <= 3020 && absY >=3839 && absY <=3856 ) || (absX >= 2456 && absX <= 2463 && absY >=4967 && absY <=4960 ) ||(absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >= 3338 && absX <= 2923 && absY >=3531 && absY <=3225 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

any one help it, would be appreciated

Read full topic
